properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 9:47AM CST until February 22 at 5:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Mississippi...

Pearl River At Jackson affecting Hinds and Rankin Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Pearl River At Jackson
* until late Friday night.
* At  9:15 AM Wednesday the stage was 35.1 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 28.0 feet.
* Forecast...Reservoir discharges into the Pearl River above Jackson
continue to decrease.  The lake pool is now low enough to store
runoff from a significant amount of rainfall if it occurs anytime
this spring above the reservoir. The river will continue falling
and will fall below flood stage Friday afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 48 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.
